basics.name: Samantha Kocher
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science - Security Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences and Japanesee Language in the East Asian Languages and Literatures at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025 and fulfill a career in Cyber Security.

work.summary: Worked retail as a sales representative.
highlights: Assist customers with their needs and help find outfits to fit their desires.
Work the cash register quickly and efficiently.

work.summary: Helped maintain reports needed for businesses for the CEO.
highlights: Input invoices into P&L's and Quickbooks.
Input new hire employee's into ADP.
Maintain and organize filing systems both online and in the office.
Created procedures and systems to teach new hire's more efficiently.
Worked closely with Google applications and Microsoft Office when created reports.
Kept track of the reps and times of each contestant to determine who places where.
Worked in groups of about 5 to determine who is assigned to what category and/or task.
